neg review:
Location not in the best area
Location outside the hotel was dirty

pos review: Nice hotel, modern design, easy access to the city highlights walking; reception staff very welcoming  Nice touch the complementary coffee in the lobby
neg review: Parking can be difficult to find, especially coming in a very busy city -for me it helped the hotel's photos where I could see the parking sign

pos review: Breakfast was provided in room as the Coronavirus outbreak. However it's very expensive for what it is
neg review: Breakfast pricing There was no gym facilities available, even though the hotel has a gym but never mentioned that it wasn't open when making a booking

pos review:
Clean, bright and colourful 
In general good staff behaviour 
The waffle counter @ bf
neg review:
We were 3 in a room. Had requested for a glass and a cup on the day of arrival. Did not get that even after 4 days 
Service is poor
Breakfast was same on all 4 days. That was boring 
Being Aug Bar and restaurants were closed 
If you are a tourist, it is better to stay near the city centre or Brussels south

pos review: Own made waffle in the breakfast
neg review: Powdered milk for the coffee in the room
Food on site is limited, and no room service.

pos review: Excellent value for money including breakfast, large uniquely decorated rooms.
